TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract NavigationGroups implements class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook._NavigationGroups, class Microsoft.Office.Interop.Outlook.NavigationGroupsEvents_12_Event

summary.span: 包含一组对象代表导航窗格中导航模块所显示的导航组。

span.span: Contains a set of objects that represent the navigation groups displayed by a navigation module in the Navigation Pane.

para.span: 这是.NET 接口派生的互操作性与相应的 COM 对象的托管代码需要 COM coclass。

span.span: This is a .NET interface derived from a COM coclass that is required by managed code for interoperability with the corresponding COM object.

para.span: 使用此派生的接口访问 COM 对象的所有方法、 属性和事件的成员。

span.span: Use this derived interface to access all method, property, and event members of the COM object.

para.span: 但是，如果方法或想要使用的事件共享相同的名称相同的 COM 对象下，强制转换为相应的主接口调用方法，并强制转换为最新的事件接口，连接到该事件。

span.span: However, if a method or event you want to use shares the same name under the same COM object, cast to the corresponding primary interface to call the method, and cast to the latest events interface to connect to the event.

para.span: 请参阅本主题的 COM 对象有关的信息。

span.span: Refer to this topic for information about the COM object.

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的方法和属性成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the method and property members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 有关 COM 对象的事件成员的信息，请参阅。

span.span: For information about the event members of the COM object, see .

para.span: 使用属性父导航模块，如对象，可以返回NavigationGroups对象。

span.span: Use the property of the parent navigation module, such as a object, to return a NavigationGroups object.

para.span: 使用方法可创建一个新的NavigationGroup对象，并将其添加到集合。

span.span: Use the method to create a new NavigationGroup object and add it to the collection.

para.span: 使用属性 (此C# 中) 以从集合中检索一个NavigationGroup对象。

span.span: Use the property (this in C#) to retrieve a NavigationGroup object from the collection.

para.span: 使用要创建新的NavigationGroup对象的NavigationGroups集合的方法。

span.span: Use the method of the NavigationGroups collection to create a new NavigationGroup object.

para.span: 使用返回指定的组类型的默认导航组。

span.span: Use the to return the default navigation group for a specified group type.
